banner.title: Hi, I'm
banner.name: Leandro Silva
banner.description: I am immersed in the world of technology, especially when it comes to mobile and web development. With 5 years of experience in the field, my goal is to continuously improve my skills and knowledge to build high-quality applications.

about.name: Leandro Silva
about.resume: Hello! I'm a software engineer with 5 years of experience, specialized in technologies such as React Native, React.js, Next.js, TypeScript, and JavaScript. I am constantly seeking to improve my skills and knowledge, prioritizing best coding practices, performance, and usability. My technical experience covers a variety of skills:
about.technology: Technologies: React.js, React Native, Next.js, and Node.js
about.state_management: State management: Zustand, Context API, and Redux
about.styling: Styling: Styled-Components, Tailwind CSS, Bootstrap, CSS, Sass, Less, and Material UI
about.principles: Principles: Clean Code, SOLID, and Clean Architecture
about.other_tools: Other tools: React Hooks, Axios, Firebase, Google Analytics, Express.js, Swagger, Git.
about.soft_skills: In addition to technical skills, I also have interpersonal skills such as teamwork, time management, client communication, decision-making, and emotional intelligence.

cea.title: C&A
cea.description: C&A’s mobile app is an online fashion store! It offers a wide selection of women's, men's, kids', beachwear, sportswear, and plus-size fashion, ensuring millions of customers have easy and fast access to C&A’s latest collections and offers right in the palm of their hand.

vr.title: VR
vr.description: Financial Solutions app by VR, composed of miniapps for digital account and credit, all inside the VR SuperApp.

tresemme.title: TRESemmé
tresemme.description: Official website of TRESemmé UK, a modern and functional platform to showcase its hair care products.

degree.title: Rexona
degree.description: Official website of Rexona in the United States, where the brand is known as Degree. A modern and functional platform ideal for presenting its deodorant and antiperspirant line.

ieclb.title: IECLB
ieclb.description: Mobile app for the Evangelical Church of the Lutheran Confession in Brazil (IECLB), aiming to spread the word of God, provide church information, and bring people closer together.

luppi.title: Luppi
luppi.description: Luppi is an innovative ticket sales platform where purchasing a ticket grants you access to a special relationship area.

contact.title: Contact
contact.name: Leandro Silva
contact.description: I am immersed in the world of technology, especially when it comes to mobile and web development.
